author: Joseph Allen
comment: I really love the way it looks on my Zenwatch 2. The only thing I don't like is the icons aren't shortcuts to the apps on the watch. Would like to access them by touching them. Seriously my only complaint.  Second complaint: after using it for a while. Step tracker icon on watch isn't updating. Fit updates on my phone but the watch always displays 0 steps.  Using Nexus 6 and Zenwatch 2.

author: Elisamuel Resto
comment: Looks nice and performs well on my Moto 360 Sport. Only complaint I have is the jagged edges on the circles for the battery and the date, they are a bit of an eye sore. I wish it had more options, like to enable or disable the digital clock, the battery, or the date. Otherwise, I love the simplicity, just that jagged lines problem.

author: Derek P
comment: The redlava app is among the top battery users listed in the android wear app and I don't even have this watchface selected. Not sure what the app is doing but uninstall it goes...

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: Android Wear shows it as less than 1% battery usage in my trials. Don't know what's different on your device.

title: Battery drain, even when not active

author: Sean Town
comment: I bought this face because I wanted to see steps taken, day/date/month, time and battery remaining and initially it worked very well, it still does. My issue is that the steps often do not always tally-up with the app on my phone (Sony Xperia). If I switch the face back to ‘Essential’ which is supplied as default the steps are the same. I don’t know where this face gets it step count from but not being accurate is annoying. Other than that, I really do like this face.

author: Andy Dawkins
comment: Difficult to install on Android Wear 2.0 but that's because that version of Android Wear is terrible and not the fault of this application. Watch face is clean, simple and easy to read.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: We apologize for any confusion. When this app was made, the phone used to automatically sync apps with the watch. Apparently that is not the case with newer watches. Look for the app in "Apps on your phone" in the GooglePlayStore on the watch. See: https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/7314014?hl=en

author: Adrian Giles
comment: Drains my huawei watch battery in half a day, native watch faces keep my watch alive for 2 whole days. Would love it if it was usable. As it looks really nice.
title: Love it but unusable

author: Vi Luong
comment: Looks great on the huawei watch. Step count is out of sync and feet icon is overlapping the border. Definitely a 5 star app when this is fixed and more customizations added.
title: Step count is out of sync

author: Francisco Palermo
comment: I like the way it looks on the watch but I can't find the app in my phone to customize the way it looks. After I found it, it doesn't have very many customization options but still looks good.
title: I like it but... Where is it? It's in the Android Wear App

author: Mike Bond
comment: I've resynced the apps through the android wear and an hour later I can't find the face. Everything is up to date to my knowledge

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: Check on Google Playstore to see if it is in My Apps. Check Android Wear for Watchfaces. Check the watch for a notification with prompt to set. Or long click on watch face.

title: Why can't I find the face?

author: Harry Goozee
comment: Just installed this on my Moto 360 v2 and it looks fantastic. It has analogue and digital which is what I wanted and it also tells the date and your steps. The ambient mode still looks good and is easy to read. A bit more customisation would be nice.
title: Looks great!

author: Jose R
comment: Looks really good on g watch r. Running 5.1.1 on note 4. Ambient mode looks great too. I wanted a watch face with both analog and digital clocks and this one does that looking great
title: Looks awesome

author: Phill Burns
comment: Working fine on Moto 360 on 5.1.1 - Looks razor sharp, great & functional WatchFace
title: Excellent

comment: Purchased this app yesterday and it says install but I can't find the app. I Uninstall it and reinstall it today still can't find the app nowhere not even inside the android wear. Try to explore the store to contact the support but I can't find it. Until they support me I can't review this product.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: We apologize for any confusion. When this app was made, the phone used to automatically sync apps with the watch. Apparently that is not the case with newer watches. Look for the app in "Apps on your phone" in the GooglePlayStore on the watch. See: https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/7314014?hl=en

author: Ryan Johnson
comment: This is a really good looking watch face.  I have it on my black 360.  It's the best one I have and works well without any issues.
Very stylish and understated. However the step counter always shows a different count to other watch faces or the phone app.

author: Azeem Ansari
comment: Would like to be able to turn off the digital clock.
title: Good looking watch, needs more flexibility

author: James M
comment: Got refunded.
title: No Weather or Custom Options.

author: Jesse
comment: Please add!
title: Needs phone battery indicator

author: Kassahun Deressa
comment: Don't buy it is fake for 360
title: Worest

author: Eddie Howard
comment: Love the look works great
title: Nice

author: Mert Ustaömer
comment: Works on Huawei watch also

author: David Richards
comment: Great watch face, would like to see steps stored on the watch.

author: Felix McDougle
comment: Good, but the steps icon is not within the circle

author: adam snider
comment: Very good. 👍
title: Perfect

author: Steve Meashey
comment: Beautiful watch face.

author: Ivã Aderne
comment: Good!

author: Salman Arif
comment: Love everything about this face, just very disappointed about the res. I have a Moto 360 and compared to the screen shot it doesn't measure up. Hope the designers update this to high res sometime soon.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: See if there is any change in the latest version. There was a configuration change on Moto 360 in 5.1.1.

author: johnnyxp64
comment: Looks fake not bright and HD disappointed compared to the screenshot and nothing for settings.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: There are settings in Android Wear configuration

title: Nuh...

author: M Lakia
comment: This is my favorite so far,  but I wish I could invert the minute and hour hand colors with the seconds hand color. Minutes and hours are a little difficult to see at times. This add alone would make this a 5 star

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: In version 1.5, there is a check box on configuration that allows you to do just that. Please update.

title: Best so far

author: David Boies
comment: Maybe an option to put a step counter, our other info could be an improvement. Great face though

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: It has a step counter now as of 1.5.

title: Great watch face

author: Tom Friend
comment: Have had for a few weeks and Love the Face.  I noticed your sample is missing an Hour hand.  It was a little difficult to figure out BUT once I did I quit paying any attention to it!  I LIKE the Time Front and Center and HIGH with the upper part of the Round Face.  Would recommend buying this  Watch Face for the Moto 360 (1st Version - can't wait for the "newly improved (battery life) version to be related later this year, I understand.
title: Red Lava Circular Moto 360 Face

author: Jim Fulmis
comment: Just got my Sony SW3 today & got it talking to Backcountry Navigator (GREAT APP) & got this watchface. Love it! Yeti
title: I like this better than the other choices I've seen

author: Meshal sa
comment: Not designed for moto 360

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: It is designed for Moto 360. Please ensure you have the latest update.

author: Campbell Phillips
comment: Lovely watch face, but just a little light on features for a paid option. Many other faces offer much more customization. I would have kept this one as it looks great as is, but I didn't have the option of setting a second time zone (using the digital for this would be great) and I do too much work with clients overseas. Weather would be a nice option as well.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: We have another watch face, Digital World Time that allows you to set two secondary time zones.

title: Great but not quite...!

author: James Maher
comment: Doesn't look very polished on my huawei watch. For example the steps icon is half in and half out of the circle. Looks a bit pixelated also. Refunded
title: Looks quite rough on huawei

author: Sumeet Puri
comment: Hence uninstalled.  Also widgets on watch face didn't work on tap. Lots to improve guys.
title: Couldn't find watch face

author: Mike Is
comment: I cant see it on moto 360

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: It can take some time to propagate, but you should have it by now. Try finding settings in Android Wear, choose the Moto 360 and choose Synch All Apps. Allow some time for it to propagate over bluetooth.

author: Aleksandar Milojkovic
comment: Pure garbage,i want a refund!

author: Yevgeniy Podgornyy
comment: There is almost no options to customize it....
title: Its ok
